missing.ui.assets

Class GWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • missing.ui.assets.GWorld

  • public class GWorld
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a wrapper class to the World objects which contains methods which are purely used for graphics and rendering.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Construct a new GWorld object.
